channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: Controls the color and brightness of the light. Can also be used to switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: Controls the brightness of the light. Can also be used to switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: White Temperature (%)
channel-type.description: White temperature from 0% (most blue - highest Kelvin) to 100% (most yellow - lowest Kelvin). The minimum and maximum Kelvin supported by this particular light can be configured in the Thing's parameters. Commands on this channel auo-generate matching commands on the K temperature channel and vice-versa.

channel-type.label: White Temperature (K)
channel-type.description: White temperature in Kelvin. The minimum and maximum Kelvin supported by this particular light can be configured in the thing's parameters. Commands on this channel auo-generate matching commands on the % temperature channel and vice-versa.

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Switch the device on and off.

channel-type.label: Enabled
channel-type.description: Whether the motion sensor is currently enabled. (This may only be changed via the Lightify app.)

channel-type.label: Triggered
channel-type.description: Whether activities associated with this motion sensor are currently triggered. (Note this is not just whether motion is detected - there must be an activity defined and it must be within its time window as well.)
